title: Why I may follow Malicious Metal
body:
I am a Morde Main.

I have been since I started playing league, back in the days when I didnt know items were important and built face of the mountain on every champ.

Because of this, up until recently, I hadn't really played any other champs

I finally one day, decided to sit down and try some other champs. First one was Nasus. I was so used to playing morde that I of course was trash at him, but I had so much fun, but, because I was trash, i was soon back to playing morde every game. Then, at the end of 2017, a friend decide to give me some RP as a late christmas gift. I already had all the morde skins, so I was confused on what i should buy, so I decided to try some champs out before I got skins for them. I tried Yorick and Warwick, and I loved them. I bought a skin for each. I now am consistently playing both of those champs, and I take a look at Morde, and am finally forced to look at what he really is. He is a sad neglected old champ, left in the dust to rot, and I had chosen to rot along with him. sure, I had a decent winrate on him, because I could make up for his shortcomings with skill, but that would only take me so far.

I still love the old scrap heap, but until he recieves some major love from Riot, i think it may be, for the first time in years, time to take a break from him.
